LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Desired.stages.0.label: read a book
LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Desired.stages.0.descrip: Reading a good book is like nourishing the mind.
LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Disliked.stages.0.label: read a book
LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Disliked.stages.0.descri: I hate reading. I was forced to read this book and hated every second of it.
